casebody.data:
CATER, et al.
v.
BARKER. No. 546A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 30, 2006. Ronald Stephen Patterson, Hayesville, for Cater and O'Connor.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 26th day of January 2006 by Defendant to Waive Oral Argument:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 30th day of January 2006."
